Psalms__08.1:
Unto the end, for<u>
                the presses
               </u>: a psalm of David.
Psalms__08.2: O Lord our Lord, how admirable is thy name in the whole earth! For thy magnificence is elevated above the heavens.
Psalms__08.3: Out of the mouth of infants and of sucklings thou hast perfected praise, because of thy enemies, that thou mayst destroy the enemy and the avenger.
Psalms__08.4: For I will behold thy heavens, the works of thy fingers: the moon and the stars which thou hast founded.
Psalms__08.5: What is man that thou art mindful of him? or the son of man that thou visitest him?
Psalms__08.6: Thou hast made him a little less than the angels, thou hast crowned him with glory and honour:
Psalms__08.7: And hast set him over the works of thy hands.
Psalms__08.8: Thou hast subjected all things under his feet, all sheep and oxen: moreover the beasts also of the fields.
Psalms__08.9: The birds of the air, and the fishes of the sea, that pass through the paths of the sea.
Psalms__08.10: O Lord our Lord, how admirable is thy name in all the earth!
